wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Thomas Anthony Richardson  (9 August 1922 – 26 March 2015) was a British Army officer who took part in the Normandy landings in June 1944, the liberation of Brussels, and the forced crossing of the Rhine.

response: Tony Richardson (1928–1991) was a British film director.
Tony Richardson may also refer to:
*Tony Richardson (American football) (born 1971), former American football fullback
*Tony Richardson (British Army officer) (1922–2015), British Army major general
